attributes.action: Do not close down pubs or restaurants during the Corona Virus outbreak
attributes.additional_details: People still want to have a regular social life. There is already far too much hype and drama over the CoronaVirus (Covid19) by the news, press and tabloids. Doctor's have already said that the Winter Flu itself is far more severe and lethal than the CoronaVirus (Covid19) as well. It So please let the public still have a social life by still keeping all local and national pubs and restaurants open during the CoronaVirus (Covid19) outbreak.
attributes.background: Do not close down the local or national pubs or restaurants  during the CoronaVirus (Covid19) Outbreak.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was started, the evidence and information about covid-19 has changed. To save lives, the Government has asked people to stay at home. You can find out more here: www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

You could start a petition calling for the Government to reopen pubs and restaurants, if that's what you want to see happen.
